meta.name: description
meta.content: The 417 Expectation Failed HTTP status code indicates an unacceptable request Content-Type or Content-Encoding.

main.p: The 417 Expectation Failed status code indicates that the expectation given in the request's Expect header could not be met by at least one of the inbound servers.
Servers produce this status code when the client makes a request with the Expect header with a value not understood by the server, see the header description for informaton.
Clients should reissue the request, reworked to not use the Expect header. See Expect header for additional informaton.

dl.dd: The Expect header has an unsupported value.

dd.a: RFC 7231: HTTP/1.1 Semantics and Content §6.5.13. 417 Expectation Failed
